com.coveo.spillway.storage

Class RedisStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coveo.spillway.storage.RedisStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LimitUsageStorage

    public class RedisStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements LimitUsageStorage
    Implementation of LimitUsageStorage using a Redis storage.

    Uses a Jedis client to communicate with the database.

    We suggest to wrap this storage in the AsyncLimitUsageStorage to avoid slowing down queries if external troubles occurs with the database.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Guillaume Simard
